BLIST.TITLE: Reducing the disk space used by a documentation
BLIST.ITEM: Get an overview of the file sizes (per file extension) du -b $(find . -type f) 2>/dev/null | awk '{split($2,a,"."); if(length(a)>1) ext=a[length(a)]; else ext="no_ext"; size[ext]+=$1} END {for(e in size) printf "%-15s %10.2f MB\n", e, size[e]/1024/1024}' | sort -k2 -rn
